system.name: Smart Scheme Rank 1
system.effect:
Your Pokémon with at least 3d6 in their Smart Stat from Poffins may activate Smart Scheme as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.
Rank 1: Fake Tears, Calm Mind
system.prerequisites: Style Expert, Smart as Chosen Stat, Novice Guile
